TopicTitle: What will be the first thing you will do in 0.23?

Articles.Content: Try to move all my mods to 0.23, then make a new save.
I'll be starting a new career And shortly afterward will be going into sandbox to mess with RAPIER before heading back to my new career save.
First thing I do will be to finally build an efficient SSTO and try to lift the science lab into orbit because YEAH SCIENCE!
Waste 50% of my time experimenting with tweakables, and seeing what happened. Maybe they'll let us do insane things, like fueling my mainsail with solid fuel or spraying oxidizer out of a RCS port.
Use SABRE engines to finally make a good SSTO.
Tweaka-tweaka-boom-boom, baby!
Start over and try to rebuild every thing and right as im getting ready to finish the last module of my grand final assemble, KSP .24 will come out and (REPEAT from beginning)

New career game

0.22 ate my last one

Try to move all my mods to 0.23, then make a new save.
Please don't post things like "start up the game" or "make a new save".

tenchars
Build new space station with SABRE SSTO because that new science module is freaking beautiful. I am also waiting to see if performance is really better than before.

First I'll spend a few days to get all my mods up and running for 0.23. Then I'll start a new career mode, I really enjoyed my last clear of the tech tree with my current mod setup, so I'm interested to see how the new parts influence my progression.
Make a working shuttle

Start again...

Try and re-establish a network of station and probes to map the universe,

This and see what mods work and wait for updates to the mods.

I really don't understand why Squad haven't implemented Kethane, Damned Robotics, and ScanSat as stock already.

Without them, the game makes no sense.
Make a Skylon
I'll backup/remove 0.22 to get a clean 0.23 install. Then I'll start a new career mode and check out the science changes (with one eye on the forum for mod updates.)
Make the smalles SSTO plane I can. Start Carreer over as I want to test out the new ways we get science since my current carreer I have expanded it all.

Appropriate forum to make this statement be damned, I just want to say, Regex, how much I love your PreciseNode mod. I no longer have a hate/hate relationship with trying to fine-tune my maneuver nodes for lengthy trips. I'm selfishly glad your first order of business is making sure PreciseNode is 0.23-compatible.

I'm usually at work when the new releases hit so you're still going to have to wait.

1. learn how they changed science spam, adjust my career save

2. check my kethane mod to see if it broke anything, fix

3. BUILD NEW SSTO

tenchars

But it's part of the fun!

Start a new Let's Play Season for 0.23 (from the beginning, again).

Season 0.22 can be found

.

Mine for resources

oh wait
Play with the sabre engines!!!
Add sabres to my Sabre.
Send up my first Career Mode space station, featuring the science lab, then build a MÃƒÂ¼n base.
The first thing!? Check every change they've made!
